high_descs: pick up the candle to the right of the sink
take the candle to the toilet
put the candle on the toilet tank
anns.task_desc: take the candle from the sink to the toilet

high_descs: Move right then face the far right side of the counter top right of the sink
Pick up the candle stick on top of the sink
Carry the candle stick over to the toilet
Place the candle stick on top of the toilet on the far right side of the toilet tank
anns.task_desc: Move a candle to the toilet tank

high_descs: Turn to the right and face the sink on the right.
Pick the candle up from the right of the sink.
Turn around and cross the room to stand on the right side of the toilet.
Put the candle down on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a candle on a toilet.
